medical_history.history_of_present_illness: Abdominal pain began 4 days prior to admission, associated with nausea but no vomiting, fevers/chills, or diarrhea. The pain is described as sharp and constant with no noted aggravating factors. The patient reports this pain feels different from previous episodes related to ruptured ovarian cysts.
medical_history.past_medical_history: Ruptured ovarian cysts in the past; fibroids. No prior episodes of similar pain.
